Flow.description: added additional outcome to Required fields Decision point.

dynamicChoiceSets.description: Choices pulled from Baird Role metadata
dynamicChoiceSets.name: SBS_Offering_and_Service

Flow.label: Create SBS Engagement

screens.name: Date_And_Offering_Services_Type_Required
screens.label: Date and Offering Services Type Required

fields.name: Both_Fields_Required
fields.fieldText: The Engagement Letter Upload Date and Offering or Services Type are required. Click Previous to return and enter a date and type.

fields.name: DateIsRequired_0_0
fields.fieldText: The Engagement Letter Upload Date is required. Click Previous to return and enter a date.

fields.name: DateIsRequired_0_0_0_0
fields.fieldText: The Engagement Letter Upload Date is required. Click Previous to return and enter a date.

fields.name: CheckThisBox
fields.fieldText: Check this box to indicate that you have reviewed: A.) Client details such as contact information, organization type, sector, etc. and B.) The list of contacts with authority to direct client activities.

fields.name: ClientSpecialDirections
fields.fieldText:
Client Special Directions


﻿The firm is to use reasonable diligence during the course of the engagement to know the essential facts concerning the client as may be needed with respect to any actions that the firm is called upon to take, including pursuant to any special direction from the client, during the course of the engagement. Depending on the specific action, the firm may already have the information it needs, or it may need to make further inquiries of its client, to fulfill this responsibility.

fields.name: CheckboxRequiredText
fields.fieldText: You must select the KYC Verified checkbox on the previous screen. Click Previous to return.

fields.name: AnalyticalServiceFeeText
fields.fieldText: The Analytical Services Fee will be populated with a default value based on the Offering/Services Type. This value can be adjusted using the Service Fee Adjustment if necessary by editing the Engagement later.

validationRule.errorMessage: The length of the Anticipated Revenue Year field must be 4 characters and the value must be greater than or equal to the current year.

fields.name: NoContactsText
fields.fieldText: No contacts have been authorized to direct client activities. The engagement cannot be created.

fields.name: DateIsRequired_0_0_0
fields.fieldText: The Offering and Services Type is required. Click Previous to return and enter a type.

fields.name: SBSEngagementCreatedDisp
fields.fieldText: The new SBS engagement has been created.
